newProperties.name: Track Artist
newProperties.description: The artist, composer, band or group that published the track.

newProperties.name: Track Thumbnail
newProperties.description: URL to track cover art: NOTE: Should be an https link to a square image, between 1400x1400 and 3000x3000 pixels, in JPEG or PNG format.

newProperties.name: Language
newProperties.description: The language of the lyrics in the track.

newProperties.name: First Released
newProperties.description: When the track was first released

newProperties.name: Link
newProperties.description: A link to the artist page.

newProperties.name: Composer or songwriter
newProperties.description: The composer(s) and/or songwriter(s) of the track.

newProperties.name: Object
newProperties.description: The entityId of the object in the data directory.

newProperties.name: Publication Status
newProperties.description: The publication status of the album.

newProperties.name: Curation Status
newProperties.description: The publication status of the album set by the a content curator on the platform.

newProperties.name: License
newProperties.description: The license of which the track is released under.

newProperties.name: Attribution
newProperties.description: If the License requires attribution, add this here.
